dc_description_s: Reproduced from the William L. Clements Library, University of Michigan.; Originally published in Paris, in 1774.; In French.; This map is Plate II of a Bicentennial Series on historical maps of the Great Lakes and Michigan.; Includes notes by historian, Wystan Stevens.|51 x 37 Centimeters|Scale approximately 1:4,000,000|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: Historical Society of Michigan (Ann Arbor, Mich)
